chiN = 20, chiACN = 20, chiBCN = 0
fA = 0.5, fB = 0.5, fC = 0.4
sigma = 0.3
NBC for both boundaries at y dimension.
La = 4.044, Lb = 4.8528 (L0 = 4.044, D = Lb, D/L0 = 1.2)
err_residual down to 1e-7 for max 20,000 iterations.
lamA = lamB = lamC

<A> = 1/(1+sigma*fC) * fA 	= 0.44642857
<B> = 1/(1+sigma*fC) * fB 	= 0.44642857
<C> = sigma/(1+sigma*fC) * fC 	= 0.10714286
